articles.description: An advertising agency representing Lenovo commissioned a Swedish metal band to perform a few key lines from a Verge review of the Lenovo Legion 5i gaming laptop. It’s as weird and delightful as it sounds.
articles.content:
Filed under:
Lenovo took our review and ran with it

articles.author: Tom Brant
articles.title: Will 2021 Be the Year of the Haptic Touchpad? - PCMag
articles.description: Haptic feedback replaces physical touchpad hinges with a superior, uniform clicking sensation. Lenovo just added it to a new ThinkPad, and more laptops are set to harness the tech in the coming months.
articles.content: Haptic touchpads have been a staple of Apple MacBooks for a few years, but they haven’t really caught on among Windows laptop manufacturers. That could change soon. These nifty input methods, with a … [+3992 chars]

articles.title: Microsoft launches Surface Pro 7+ laptop for Business users - India TV News
articles.description: Surface Pro 7+ joins the Surface for Business portfolio - offering the versatility, connectivity and security that business and educational institutions need to adapt to the changing landscape.
articles.content:

articles.title: Valorant Episode 2 Presents a New Agent Named Yoru • Wowkia.com - Wowkia
